alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 9:42PM CDT until June 29 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern Thomas County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1030 PM CDT/930 PM MDT/. * At 941 PM CDT/841 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Medicine Lake to 17 miles west of Brownlee to 10 miles southwest of Mullen, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Mullen, Thedford, Seneca, Brownlee, Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, Merritt Reservoir, Speckel Meir Lake, Marsh Flat, Norway, Indian Hill, Giant Hill, Sevenmile Hill, Hecla, Kelso, and Weir. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 167 and 213. Highway 97 between mile markers 57 and 119. Highway 83 between mile markers 146 and 182. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
